title: Scotch pancakes with sultanas, honey and lemon
ingredients: ['2 large lemons, zested and juiced', '4 tablespoons sultanas', '200g self-raising flour', '120g sugar (cane, caster or granulated)', '2 medium eggs', '125ml milk (full fat or semi skimmed)', '1 tablespoon honey', 'sunflower or rapeseed oil for frying']
